'''Birch Wood'''  is obtained by cutting down Birches. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Birches are found in [[Windwail Highland]] and [[Stormbearer Mountains]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=219 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
